name: Loopy corsage in pale blue, pink or green
description: This is a very loopy corsage. Made using Pale blue, pink or green wool mix felt and incorporating lots of loops. Sculptural and on trend. It certainly makes a statement. It measures 10cm across. I have concealed the brooch pin in a blanket stitched panel. It will brighten up the plainest t-shirt or coat. The corsage will be packed in tissue paper and a gift box. The price is for one loopy brooch and not a set of three.

name: Flow brooch in yellow, grey or black
description: Meet the flow brooch. Named because of the way it undulates and flows and inspired by some 1970s fabric I recently bought. Made with yellow, grey or black wool mix felt. Sculptural and tactile. I have concealed the brooch pin in a blanket stitched panel. It will brighten up the plainest t-shirt or coat. Maybe wear a few together for more impact. The brooch will be packed in tissue paper and a gift box. The price is for one flow brooch and not a set of three.
